full_summary:
=====================================================

### Request for Proposal: W0100-234272 Digital Cable Television Services - CFB Halifax, NS

#### Introduction

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites tenders for the purchase and installation of Digital Television Services at various buildings within the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, located in the Halifax Regional Municipality (HRM). This request-for-proposal (RFP) calls for a three-year contract with an optional two-year extension period.

#### Key Requirements

The successful bidder will provide:

* Digital Television Services at CFB Halifax
* Equipment installation and setup
* Ongoing maintenance and support

The scope of work includes the installation of Digital Television Services at multiple locations within CFB Halifax. The contract duration will be for three years, with an option to extend for a further two years.

#### Site Visit

A site visit will be conducted on May 14, 2024. Offerors wishing to attend must notify the Contracting Authority by May 6, 2024, at 14:00pm ADT, providing the name(s) of their representatives. The Contracting Authority will assign a specific time slot. Offerors who do not attend the site visit will not be precluded from submitting a proposal but will not be given an alternative appointment.

#### Tender Submission

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Ariba platform by June 6, 2024, at 14:00:00 ADT. Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Contract Award

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted, considering the quality and delivered value of the proposals.

#### Contact Information

For additional information or clarification, please contact:

Maryse Cyr
Public Services and Procurement Canada
Email: maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Important Dates

* Site Visit: May 14, 2024
* Tender Submission Deadline: June 6, 2024, 14:00:00 ADT

#### Security Requirement

This RFP document contains security requirements. Offerors must comply with all applicable security policies and regulations.

Please refer to the full details in the RFP document available on the Ariba platform.
